description:
Goodwin was an Alliance military officer serving in the military public relations office. When http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wen-li] was promoted to Lt Commander on 19 September 788 UC, he was assigned as Yang`s public relations manager for the duration of his extended leave. During their initial meeting, Yang surmised from his advanced age then that Goodwin rose to his rank of Lieutenant as an enlisted serviceman, instead of being commissioned as an officer via the Free Planets Alliance Officer Academy.
Gineipedia
name: Goodwin
